name: Taking Ctrl
description:
Description:

"Taking Ctrl" is a slapstick puzzle-platformer, where you help the famous Left Control escape from his captors and overcome his corrupted rival, Right Control, in a series of challenging puzzles and obstacles. But don't forget — you can't lose Ctrl along the way!

This game is a submission to the Playsar Fest March 2023.

Credits: 

Michael Pavlov  

George Davlyatshin

Nastasya Smirnyagina 

Music (CC-BY 3.0): 

HorrorPen

syncopika
